short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make it obvious if you're buying from a 3rd party Amazon seller.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds the text "(3rd Party Seller)" to the Add to Cart button on Amazon. This makes it more obvious when you're buying from Amazon and when you're buying from a 3rd party seller.
